name: Let There Be Cat!
description:
What's more chaos than a cat?

Play as a cat, run around, break stuffs, sabotage human, generate chaos, and try not to get caught!

(Note: The dog is not in the game yet, will need to wait for the submission to be unlocked.)

If you find cutscenes annoying, you can disable it in the settings.

You can play with a gamepad/controller, but UI(Pause/Press Button) doesn't work with it.

Upcoming updates (waiting for submission to be unlocked):

- Cat now have 3 lives

- Controls: Alternative interact control - Mouse click, X (Gamepad)

- Call in you partner in crime, a dog!

Credit

Cat sprite from 2D Pixel Art Cat Sprites

SFX from freesound.org

Music from Casual Game BGM #5

All other assets/sprites are made by myself.

This game is made for the Brackey's Game Jam 2021.2, which is the first game jam I've ever joined. I had no experience with 2D games and pixel art prior to this, and I'm proud to say that I've learned a lot in the making of this game. One thing I didn't get a chance to learn is music. I wanted to make my own music for this game, but 2D game and pixel art are already a lot to learn, so the time left was too short for me to learn how to make music. Hopefully I have the chance to do that in the next game jam.

Checkout my devlog at https://boonlightgames.com/
